review: Has been my doctor for 2 decades.  Has been correct in almost all occasions as to the diagnosis and treatment. Conservative but yet up to date. Doesn't prescribe the most expensive drugs that other diabetologists do and hook you onto. Friendly and understanding.
Went for treatment of giddiness for my husband. Was good diagnosis and referral. Diagonised as vertigo and suggested more tests for confirmation. Overall good experience.
for a 10 am appointment he arrived at 10.45 am**** ****** ** ********* and waited for my feedback to come to conclusions

Wouldn’t recommend to anyone because he isn’t friendly, not willing to hear our symptoms and issues .. Also , he comes to conclusion without hearing what happens fully .. Over all very bad experience and would definitely skip next time .. he is also sooo scared of Covid ..
Doctor is understanding and considerate. And cares about his patients well-being.  Doesn't not give Unnecessary medicines.
Doctor approached the patient very systematically and patiently, with thorough history taking and examination.
